name: Good Times Cheeseburger
description: Raise your hand if you like a good time! Well, have we got a burger for you! With each bite, you’ll taste a perfect harmony of juicy patties, melted cheese, and fan-favourite Big Burger Sauce. Add an easy side salad to your plate for a perfectly balanced, summer dinner.

ingredients.name: grated light cheddar cheese or crumbled fresh cheese

preparation:
1. In a bowl, lightly beat egg, if using. Combine with ground beef and seasoning. Form mixture into four patties.
  2. Grill over medium-high heat with lid closed for 4 min each side, or until an instant-read thermometer indicates a Food Safe internal temperature of 160° F.
  3. Meanwhile, in a small bowl, combine mayonnaise, sauce mix, ketchup, and relish. Set aside.
  4. Top patties with cheese to melt during last minute of cooking.
  5. Place patties on bottom halves of buns, then divide lettuce on top; add toppings. Spread top bun halves with sauce, then cover.
tips: Customize as you like. Swap ground beef for chicken, pork, turkey, or ground soy.
